txt.en: You have discovered a helm of the White Hand
You have found a sword of the White Hand
Half-orc raiders from the mountains have attacked a number of small farmholds around Nan Laeglin. Guladus Brehures desires to display trophies of their defeat upon the walls of her home.

'My hatred of the White Hand and his half-orc minions knows no bounds, [placeholder]. You brought to me the evidence I needed to openly speak against Saruman, but there is more you can do for me.\n\n'Go forth once more and defeat Saruman's lieutenants and bring me trophies of your victory...I will display them upon my cartrev for all to see!'

Half-orcs can be found throughout Nan Laeglin, especially where they have raided Uch-l没th farmsteads.\n\nThere must be some bosses driving the half-orc raiders into Nan Laeglin. It is possible that among them one may be carrying equipment with the sigils of Isengard upon it.
'Fine trophies, [placeholder]. I will display these with pride!'

Half-orcs can be found throughout Nan Laeglin, especially where they have raided Uch-l没th farmsteads.\n\nThere must be some bosses driving the half-orc raiders into Nan Laeglin. It is possible that among them one may be carrying equipment with the sigils of Isengard upon it.

Half-orcs can be found throughout Nan Laeglin, especially where they have raided Uch-l没th farmsteads.\n\nThere must be some bosses driving the half-orc raiders into Nan Laeglin. It is possible that among them one may be carrying equipment with the sigils of Isengard upon it.
'Bring me the trophies I desire, [placeholder], and I will grant you a reward.'

Half-orcs can be found throughout Nan Laeglin, especially where they have raided Uch-l没th farmsteads.\n\nThere must be some leaders driving the half-orc raiders into Nan Laeglin. It is possible that among them one may be carrying equipment with the sigils of Isengard upon it.
'Bring me the trophies I desire, [placeholder], and I will grant you a reward.'

Guladus Brehures is at the Brenin's Hall in Lhanuch.\n\nHaving found gear bearing the sign of the White Hand upon the half-orcs raiding Nan Laeglin, you may return to Guladus Brehures and present her with your trophies.
'Bring me the trophies I desire, [placeholder], and I will grant you a reward.'
